arts.ttl: 'We got that badly wrong' - Wigan Athletic boss pulls no punches after Burton Albion setback
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney acknowledged there was more than one reason why Wigan Athletic suffered a shock home defeat to League One's bottom club Burton Albion.

arts.ttl: Burton move off foot of League One table after comeback win away at Wigan
arts.sum: Thelo Aasgaard fired the hosts in front, but Jon Dadi Bodvarsson and Rumarn Burrell sealed a valuable three points for Albion.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 1 Burton Albion 2 - Tics droop against bottom-of-the-table Brewers
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic couldn’t continue their recent resurgence despite Thelo Aasgaard’s opening goal as they crashed 2-1 at home to bottom-of-the-table Burton Albion.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Five changes in our expected team v Burton Albion!
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Burton Albion at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic could get chance to sign midfielder on full-time basis in the summer
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic loanee Ollie Norburn has likely played his last game for loan club Blackpool, Steve Bruce has… The post Wigan Athletic could get chance to sign midfielder on full-time basis in the summer appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Third Wigan Athletic Academy product joins Hull City in space of six months
arts.sum: Kyle Joseph has become the third Wigan Athletic Academy product to join Championship outfit Hull City in the last six months after completing his move from Blackpool.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief discusses chances of extending Thelo Aasgaard's contract
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney felt Thelo Aasgaard took his form to 'another level' during his latest match-winning contribution for Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic chief favourite for League One vacancy
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic boss Leam Richardson has emerged as the bookmakers' favourite for the managerial vacancy at Wycombe Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic given green light to make loan move permanent
arts.sum: Ollie Norburn has been given the green light to make permanent his loan move to Wigan Athletic - if his new club wants to pursue a summer swoop.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wigan Athletic vs. Burton Albion - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's League One clash between Wigan Athletic and Burton Albion, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
